subject: Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Bauke Mollema of the Netherlands won the 17th stage of the Vuelta a España in a sprinting finish, and Vincenzo Nibali retained his overall lead by 28 seconds over Chris Horner of the United States.
snippet: Bauke Mollema of the Netherlands won the 17th stage of the Vuelta a España in a sprinting finish, and Vincenzo Nibali retained his overall lead by 28 seconds over Chris Horner of the United States.
